org.yamcs.alarms

Class ActiveAlarm<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.yamcs.alarms.ActiveAlarm<T>

  • public class ActiveAlarm<T>
extends Object
    Keeps track of the alarm for one parameter or event.

    Note: generics parameter T can effectively be either ParameterValue or Yamcs.Event
